mapper.select: select uu.id as universityId,uu.name as universityName,uu.photo_url as photoUrl,uu.property,uu.rank,uu.educationLevel,dd.name as educationLevelName from zgk_university uu LEFT JOIN zgk_data_dict dd on dd.type='EDULEVEL' AND dd.dictId=uu.educationLevel where uu.id=#{universityId}

select eduLevel,count(eduLevel) as number,dd.name as eduLevelName from zgk_zj_3in7 zz LEFT JOIN zgk_data_dict dd on dd.type='EDULEVEL' AND dd.dictId=zz.eduLevel where zz.universityId=#{universityId} GROUP BY zz.eduLevel
